Class ConsoleIOHandler

java.lang.Object
IOHandlers.ConsoleIOHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputOutputHandler
public class ConsoleIOHandler extends Object implements InputOutputHandler
Handles console-based input and output operations.
Author:
24862664
